articles.author: ELIZABETH LAW
articles.title: China to approve mRNA Covid-19 vaccine soon, East Asia News & Top Stories - The Straits Times
articles.description: Named BNT162b2, the vaccine is internationally known as the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
BEIJING - China's drug regulator is set to give the green light for the first foreign-made mRNA vaccine.
Shanghai-based Fosun Pharma said the National Medical Products Administration (NMPA) recently… [+3462 chars]

articles.title: Netizens slam authorities for “giving excuses” that daily enforcement checks on pivoted nightlife venues have been conducted since Oct - The Online Citizen Asia

articles.content: Government agencies have conducted daily enforcement checks on food and beverage (F&B) outlets, as well as pivoted nightlife establishments, since October last year, with about 400 outlets inspec… [+9948 chars]

articles.title: Zheng Shuang breaks 6-month silence, apologises for surrogacy scandal, denies tax evasion - AsiaOne
